title: 3D Printer
alt: I just can't wait for the Better Homes and Gardens list of helpful tips for household reuse of sixteen-inch acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrene phalluses.
transcript:
[Two people before a 3D printer, one with a wrench.]
Cueball: 3D printers are getting incredible.
Ponytail: I think we're not far from widespread deployment.Ponytail: And you know what that means.Cueball: Spam containing actual enlarged penises?
Ponytail: I give it a week.
